data.name: Regalia: Of Men and Monarchs - The Unending Grimoire
data.detailed_description:
Your little kingdom just got a little more crowded with the arrival of Bassanius the Mystic! He came to Ascalia with his most valued possessions, including the powerful Grimoire that will open new possibilities for you and your friends.

The Grimoire allows players to challenge themselves in randomly generated battles in return for additional visual customization options for the party members. It is divided into chapters and within the Grimoire, the kid gloves are off - all sorts of unexpected combinations can happen. Do you know what would happen if you were to fight the Dwarven Ashigaru and the Visage of Anguish at the same time? What if the Fomorian Ancient allied itself with the Mau? These battles will thoroughly test your skills - and sanity.
Fighting within the Grimoire takes no in-game time (they do not advance the calendar) and can be played anytime you want, right from the point when you build the Mystic's Tower for Bassanius.

The Unending Grimoire DLC comes with:

  • A whole new activity - the Grimoire
  • An entirelyl new feature - Visual Customization for Characters
  • 39 character skins to unlock!
  • New battlegrounds for the Grimoire battles
  • A new villager to recruit - Bassanius the Mystic
  • A new building to construct - Mystic's Tower
  • A new Personal Bond to pursue
  • New cutscenes with additional voiceover

data.short_description: Your little kingdom just got a little more crowded with the arrival of Bassanius the Mystic! Now fight your way through the Grimoire battles on new battlegrounds, unlock new skins for your party members and pursue a new personal bond in... THE UNENDING GRIMOIRE!
data.supported_languages:
English*, German, Polish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: 3.0 GHz Dual-Core - Intel Core 2 Duo E8400 / Athlon 64 X2 6000+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB VRAM, DirectX® 9.0c Compatible - Intel HD 4400 / NVIDIA GeForce 9600GT / AMD Radeon HD 3850
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 9.0c Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: 3.1 GHz Dual-Core - Intel i3 2100
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB VRAM, DirectX® 9.0c Compatible - NVIDIA GeForce GTX 550 Ti / AMD Radeon HD 5850
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 9.0c Compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mountain Lion 10.8.5
  • Processor: 2.66 GHz Dual-Core - Intel Core 2 Duo E8135
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB VRAM, NVIDIA GeForce 9400M / AMD Radeon HD 2600 Pro
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: El Capitan 10.11.6
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Quad-Core - Intel i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB VRAM - NVIDIA GeForce GTX 775M
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ / SteamOS+
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB VRAM - NVIDIA GeForce 9600GT / AMD Radeon HD 3850
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+ / SteamOS+
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB VRAM - NVIDIA GeForce GTX 550 Ti / AMD Radeon HD 5850
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
